entities.name: CLI
entities.description: CLI (Command Line Interface) is a method of executing commands in a text-based interface, often used for running scripts or software commands.

entities.name: yao run command
entities.description: The 'yao run' command is a specific command used in the CLI to execute processes.

entities.name: HTTP Server
entities.description: An HTTP Server is a server that uses the Hypertext Transfer Protocol to serve requests and responses over the web.

entities.name: REST API
entities.description: REST API (Representational State Transfer Application Programming Interface) is a set of rules and conventions for building and interacting with web services.

entities.name: Yao Widget
entities.description: A Yao Widget is a self-contained unit in the Yao framework that combines UI, interaction, logic, and data without separating frontend and backend.

entities.name: DSL
entities.description: DSL (Domain-Specific Language) is a computer language specialized to a particular application domain, used here to describe Yao Widgets in JSON format.

relationships.description: CLI uses the 'yao run' command to execute processes.
The HTTP Server uses REST API to run processes via web requests.
A Yao Widget is described using DSL in JSON format.
